languages.text: "Я обойдусь без нравоучений ксеноса. Знай свое место".
"I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
languages.original_text: "Я обойдусь без нравоучений ксеноса. Знай свое место".

traits.locale_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「我は異種族に道徳を説けません。身の程を知れ」
languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."

traits.locale_text: 「我は異種族に道徳を説けません。身の程を知れ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我不需要异形的说教，管好你自己。”
languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."

traits.locale_text: “我不需要异形的说教，管好你自己。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je me passerai des leçons de morale xénos. Restez à votre place. »
languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."

traits.locale_text: « Je me passerai des leçons de morale xénos. Restez à votre place. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No necesito que una xenos me intente dar lecciones de ética».
languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."

traits.locale_text: «No necesito que una xenos me intente dar lecciones de ética».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich komme gut ohne moralisierende Xenos zurecht. Mäßigt Euch."
languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."

traits.locale_text: "Ich komme gut ohne moralisierende Xenos zurecht. Mäßigt Euch."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I can do without the xenos moralising. Know your place."
